import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { Card, CardActionArea, CardMedia, CardActions, CardContent, Typography } from '@material-ui/core'; import Img from '../../../img/recruitment.png'; const CorpServices = ({ job, staff}) => { const [LMsrv, setLMsrv] = useState([]); const [RMsrv, setRMsrv] = useState([]); const [company, setCompany] = useState(); const [page, setPage] = useState(0); const [spinner,setSpinner] = useState(true) useEffect(() => { const com = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem('key')); setCompany(com); }, []); return ( <>
{/* show RM based on sub status */} {company && company.sub_status_rm === 'active' ?

Corporate Recruitment Management Widespread group of squamate reptiles, with over 6,000 species, ranging across all continents except Antarctica
: "" }

Corporate Leadership
Management Widespread group of squamate reptiles, with over 6,000 species, ranging across all continents except Antarctica
); } export default CorpServices;
